definitions.definition: To sing , especially without instruments, and as applied to monophonic and pre-modern music.
To sing or intone sacred text.
To utter or repeat in a strongly rhythmical manner, especially as a group.
examples: The football fans chanted insults at the referee.

definitions.definition: To sell horses fraudulently , exaggerating their merits.

main_definition: To sing , especially without instruments, and as applied to monophonic and pre-modern music.
secondary_definitions: To sing or intone sacred text.
To utter or repeat in a strongly rhythmical manner, especially as a group.
( transitive , archaic ) To sell horses fraudulently , exaggerating their merits.
